pacman.api.common
Class Utility

java.lang.Object
  pacman.api.common.Utility
Direct Known Subclasses:
JUtil
public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a set of useful basic static methods used to simplify navigation on the maze.

Author:
e.zhu
